sentences.en: An error dialog should always be polite, illuminating, and helpful.
sentences.cn: 错误消息框应该始终有礼貌 、 具有启发性, 还要助人为乐.

sentences.en: As the rider rattled down the hill again and through the street, the village was illuminating.
sentences.cn: 骑马的人嗒嗒嗒跑下山穿过街道时, 村子照了个通亮.

sentences.en: He was much travelled; his comments on trends and personalities were invariably illuminating.
sentences.cn: 他游历很广, 对人对事有极精辟的见解.

sentences.en: His autobiography provides an illuminating insight into his mind.
sentences.cn: 他的自传可以让读者深入洞察他的精神世界。

sentences.en: I found his talk most illuminating.
sentences.cn: 我觉得他的话很有启发性.

sentences.en: I have never listened to a more illuminating exposition of the subject.
sentences.cn: 我从未听过有关这个问题的详细讲解.

sentences.en: Illuminance of illuminating radiation is always measured in photometric units.
sentences.cn: 照明辐射的照度通常是以光度为单位.

sentences.en: Its small wick flickered weakly, illuminating only a small part of the room.
sentences.cn: 一点豆大的暗淡的灯光无力地摇晃着, 只照亮了这个房间的小部分.
一盏照亮街道的路灯也没有。

sentences.en: That biography is an illuminating footnote to our times.
sentences.cn: 那篇传记对我们这个时代是个很有启发性的补充说明.

sentences.en: The only light which is illuminating the scene is the sphere.
sentences.cn: 惟一的照亮场景的光源那个球.

sentences.en: The period in the F ü hrer's bunker is very illuminating.
sentences.cn: 在富勒尔的地堡里的日子能够说明很多.

sentences.en: The teacher gave us an illuminating lecture.
sentences.cn: 老师给我们上了一堂有启发性的一课.

sentences.en: The utility model discloses an LED mainly used in illuminating.
sentences.cn: 本实用新型公开了一种发光二极管,其主要用途为照明.

sentences.en: These clouds show spectra remarkably similar to those of the illuminating star.
sentences.cn: 这些云的光谱与照射它的亮星的光谱极其相似.

sentences.en: We didn't find the examples he used particularly illuminating.
sentences.cn: 我们觉得他采用的那些例证启发性不是特别大。

words.tran_cn: 照明；启发；兴奋（illuminate的过去分词）
阐明，说明；照亮；使灿烂；用灯装饰
照亮的，照明的；启蒙的，有启发性的
照明，阐释（illuminate的现在分词形式）

trans.tran_cn: 使明亮( illuminate的现在分词 )，照亮，装饰，说明
trans.tran_en: To illuminate something means to shine light on it and to make it brighter and more visible
